---
title: "Data Cleansing"
author: "Aidan Dold"
date: "2025-10-13"
output: html_document
---

Upload the Data 
```{r}
library(readxl)
nfl_data_file <- read_excel("nfl_data_file.xlsx")
View(nfl_data_file)
```

Remove the extra columns
```{r}
nfl_data_file$...23 <- NULL
nfl_data_file$...24 <- NULL
nfl_data_file$...25 <- NULL
nfl_data_file$...26 <- NULL
nfl_data_file$...27 <- NULL
nfl_data_file$...28 <- NULL
names(nfl_data_file)[22] <- "Over_Under_Hit"
```

Check to make sure data is cleansed
```{r}
View(nfl_data_file)
```
